org.openhubframework.openhub.core.circuitbreaker

Class AbstractCircuitBreaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.core.circuitbreaker.AbstractCircuitBreaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CircuitBreaker
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircuitBreakerHazelcastImpl, CircuitBreakerInMemoryImpl

    public abstract class AbstractCircuitBreaker
extends Object
implements CircuitBreaker
    Simple CircuitBreaker implementation base, does use CircuitState domain object to store state. All the interface methods are implemented, in its minimal variant only method to resolve CircuitState for given circuit is needed to be implemented. There are multiple "hooks" method that can be overriden - onSuccessCall, onCircuitDown, see javadoc directly on each of them.
    Since:
    2.2
    Author:
    Karel Kovarik
    See Also:
    CircuitState

    • Method Detail

      • updateCircuitState

        public Processor updateCircuitState()
        Description copied from interface: CircuitBreaker
        Update circuit state. Should be called if service call fail, or if succeeds. Based on exception present, it should decide that call was success or not.
        Specified by:
        updateCircuitState in interface CircuitBreaker
        Returns:
        processor to update circuit state.

      • checkCircuitIsOpen

        public Processor checkCircuitIsOpen()
                             throws CircuitDownException
        Description copied from interface: CircuitBreaker
        Check whether circuit is open. Does nothing if yes, however if circuit is breaked down, it does throw exception.
        Specified by:
        checkCircuitIsOpen in interface CircuitBreaker
        Returns:
        processor to check circuit.
        Throws:
        CircuitDownException - if circuit is in shortcut state.

      • shouldBreakCircuit

        protected boolean shouldBreakCircuit(CircuitState circuitState,
                                     CircuitConfiguration circuitConfiguration)
        Logic to resolve if circuit should change it state to down.
        Parameters:
        circuitState - the circuit state.
        circuitConfiguration - the circuit configuration.
        Returns:
        flag, true if circuit should switch down.

      • getCircuitState

        protected abstract CircuitState getCircuitState(String circuitName)
        Get circuit state for circuit identified by its name.
        Parameters:
        circuitName - the name of circuit.
        Returns:
        CircuitState, not null, if circuit is misconfigured, exception should be thrown.

      • onFailedCall

        protected void onFailedCall(String circuitName)

      • removeOldEntries

        protected void removeOldEntries(CircuitConfiguration configuration)
        Invoked each time exchange is passed via CircuitBreaker. It is expected to clean old entries in circuit state.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the configuration of circuit.
